mapper.sql: t.BUILDING_ID as buildingId,t.BUILDING_NAME as buildingName,ds.REGION_ID as dsRegionId, ds.REGION_NAME as dsRegionName,t.REGION_ID as regionId, r.REGION_NAME as regionName,t.AREA as area, t.BUILDING_TYPE_NAME as buildingTypeName, t.BUILDING_ADDRESS as buildingAddress,t.FLOOR_NUMBER as floorNumber, t.BUILDING_TYPE as buildingType,decode(t.BUILDING_TYPE,'QT','其它','SQLY', '商务楼宇','SQYQ','园区','SQSC', '专业市场','SQSS','厂企宿舍','SQWB','网吧','SQJD','宾馆酒店','SQQT','商企其他') as buildingTypeDesc, t.BUILDING_LEVEL as buildingLevel,decode(t.BUILDING_LEVEL, 0, '其它', 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C') as buildingLevelName, t.HOUSEHOLDER_NUMBER as householderNumber, t.PROPERTY_COMPANY as propertyCompany, t.PROPERTY_MANAGER as propertyManager, t.PROPERTY_MANAGER_CONTACT as propertyManagerContact,t.REMARK as remark, t.CREATE_STAFF_ID as createStaffId, t.CREATE_DATE as createDate, t.MODIFY_STAFF_ID as modifyStaffId, t.MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate
mapper.select:
select
from BD_BUILDING_OPPORTUNITY t, SPC_REGION r, SPC_REGION ds where t.delete_flag = 0 and t.region_id = r.region_id and r.super_region_id = ds.region_id
AND t.region_id in (select r.region_id from spc_region r start with r.region_id = #{dsRegionId} connect by prior r.region_id = r.super_region_id)
AND t.region_id = #{regionId}
AND t.BUILDING_NAME like '%'||#{buildingName}||'%'
order by t.BUILDING_ID desc
mapper.insert:
select seq_bd_building_opportunity.nextval as buildingId from dual
insert into BD_BUILDING_OPPORTUNITY values (#{buildingId},#{buildingName},#{buildingLevel},#{buildingType},#{buildingTypeName},#{buildingAddress}, #{regionId},#{floorNumber},#{area},#{householderNumber}, #{propertyCompany},#{propertyManager},#{propertyManagerContact}, #{remark},#{deleteFlag},#{createStaffId},#{createDate},#{modifyStaffId},#{modifyDate},#{modifyOp})
mapper.select:
select
from BD_BUILDING_OPPORTUNITY t, SPC_REGION r, SPC_REGION ds where t.delete_flag = 0 and t.region_id = r.region_id and r.super_region_id = ds.region_id and t.BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId} order by t.BUILDING_ID desc
mapper.update: update BD_BUILDING_OPPORTUNITY t set t.BUILDING_NAME = #{buildingName}, t.BUILDING_LEVEL=#{buildingLevel},t.BUILDING_TYPE=#{buildingType},t.BUILDING_TYPE_NAME=#{buildingTypeName},t.BUILDING_ADDRESS=#{buildingAddress}, t.REGION_ID=#{regionId},t.FLOOR_NUMBER=#{floorNumber},t.AREA=#{area},t.HOUSEHOLDER_NUMBER=#{householderNumber}, t.PROPERTY_COMPANY=#{propertyCompany},t.PROPERTY_MANAGER=#{propertyManager},t.PROPERTY_MANAGER_CONTACT=#{propertyManagerContact},t.REMARK=#{remark}, t.MODIFY_STAFF_ID=#{modifyStaffId},t.MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate} where t.BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId} and t.delete_flag = 0
